titles.title: To amend the Act of June 15, 1938, to extend the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to purchase lands within the boundaries of certain National Forests in the State of California to include the Angeles National Forest and to expand the purposes for which such purchases may be made.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 4/30/1998--Introduced. Amends Federal law to extend the Secretary of Agriculture's authority to purchase lands within certain California national forests to include the Angeles National Forest and to expand the purposes for which such purchases may be made.
